name: portfolioproject-howareyoureally
description: Portfolio project- This is a website for a fictional company that sells monthly subscription boxes for mental health, includes HTML, CSS, Sass, JS, Bootstrap, and jQuery so far

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts
scripts.usemin: usemin boxdescription.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/boxdescription.html && usemin faq.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/faq.html && usemin store.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/store.html && usemin shoppingcart.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/shoppingcart.html && usemin navigation.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/navigation.html && usemin loginmodal.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/loginmodal.html && usemin howitworks.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/howitworks.html && usemin homepage.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/homepage.html && usemin footer.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/footer.html && usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html

author: Danielle Robitshek
